metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6128 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The TIFFFdOpen function in tif_unix.c in LibTIFF 4.0.10 has a memory leak, as demonstrated by pal2rgb.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.2
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.2
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.2
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.2').
